body:
Summary

### Expected Result

tcltk capability should be true

### Actual Result

tcltk capability is false

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install r +X
$ module load r-3.4...
$ R
$ > capabilities("tcltk")
$ FALSE
...
```
1. tcl & tk listed as dependence, so by default R should be compiled with tcltk option
2. Default installtion didn't work, so added '--with-tcltk" to config_args, still got the same result


### Information on your system

Centos 7, gcc 7.2
title: R installation: tcltk capability missing
